scripts.watch:demo: nodemon --exec "cd packages/demo && yarn build:mitosis:plugins && yarn build:main" --watch packages/demo/src --watch packages/demo/mitosis --watch packages/demo/scripts --ignore packages/demo/mitosis -e tsx,ts
scripts.watch:demo-solid: nodemon --exec "cd packages/demo-react && yarn install && yarn build" --watch packages/demo-react --delay 5 --ignore packages/demo-react/dist -e tsx,ts
